General.Name: ABC arbitrage SA
General.Description: ABC arbitrage SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of arbitrage strategies for liquid assets worldwide. It develops liquidity, statistical, risk, and derivatives arbitrage strategies; and provides asset and portfolio management services. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 18, rue du Quatre Septembre, Paris, France, 75002
